verbs.description: The G7 Summit [V: is] often marred with protests in host city , but with Trump ’s America First agenda , which will hit US allies with trade tariffs , the President will be the one receiving a hostile reception this year .

[ARG1: The G7 Summit] is [ARGM-TMP: often] [V: marred] [ARG0: with protests in host city] , but with Trump ’s America First agenda , which will hit US allies with trade tariffs , the President will be the one receiving a hostile reception this year .

The G7 Summit is often marred with protests in host city , but with Trump ’s America First agenda , which [V: will] hit US allies with trade tariffs , the President will be the one receiving a hostile reception this year .

The G7 Summit is often marred with protests in host city , but with [ARG0: Trump ’s America First agenda] , [R-ARG0: which] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: hit] [ARG1: US allies with trade tariffs] , the President will be the one receiving a hostile reception this year .

The G7 Summit is often marred with protests in host city , but with Trump ’s America First agenda , which will hit US allies with trade tariffs , the President [V: will] be the one receiving a hostile reception this year .
